title: The Unexpected Adventures of David Parker: Guardian of History

story.text: At the local museum where David Parker regularly volunteers as a guide, he discovers an ancient artifact that emits a mysterious glow when he touches it.

David experiences his first trace of new-found powers: he can see historical events unfold like vivid flashbacks when near certain artifacts. His lion-hearted personality shines as he resolves to use this power to educate.
During a presentation to schoolchildren, David uses his power inadvertently, bringing a revolutionary war battle to life. The children are enraptured, and word of his vivid tours begins to spread.
David feels the strain of his powers, noticing that they are taking a physical toll on him. Nevertheless, he continues his tours, driven by a passion for history and education.
A suspicious character visits the museum, questioning David about his abilities. David cleverly evades direct answers while mentally noting to be cautious.
David meets a historian who reveals she knows about his powers. She offers him an ancient book said to control such powers more effectively.
After studying the book, David learns to control his powers without strain. As a test, he curates a grand historical presentation that earns ovations and secures future funding for the museum.

ending: Guided by his love for history, David Parker turned an unexpected gift into a legendary teaching tool.
moral: Even in later years, one can discover new roles to play in making a difference for others.
